title: Fox Favors Disney, Weight Watchers Goes ‘Free Style’, PlayStation Resonates With Gamers
itunes:title: Fox Favors Disney, Weight Watchers Goes ‘Free Style’, PlayStation Resonates With Gamers
description:
Paul Sweeney, Bloomberg Intelligence U.S. Director of Research, discusses Fox prefering to sell some assets to Disney. Gary Foster, Chief Scientific Officer at Weight Watchers, describes their new "Freestyle" points program. We Drive to the Close with Randy Watts, Chief Investment Strategist at William O'Neil & Company. Eric Lempel, Head of PlayStation Network, talks about the growth of virtual reality. And Carol and Cory hit today’s Movers and Shakers on Wall Street and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has his “Stock of the Day.” 

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
